title: Add Obsidian MCP to ralphtools ecosystem
description: Integrate Obsidian Claude Code MCP plugin into ralphtools. Add to wizard, document in README, create install script.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create scripts/install-obsidian-mcp.sh that builds and installs plugin
Script handles multiple vaults (let user choose)
Add 'Obsidian MCP' step to ralph-setup wizard
Wizard asks if user wants Obsidian integration
Wizard runs install script if yes
Wizard prompts for MCP port from Obsidian plugin settings
Generate settings.json MCP config that references 1Password
Add troubleshooting section (port conflicts, connection issues)
Test: Fresh install works on new vault
Test: Plugin appears in Obsidian after install
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
